helpMessage: Friend Time will automatically react with üï∞Ô∏è to times mentioned in chat. If you also react, you will be messaged with the time converted to your time zone.
**-ft set *<zone>*** - Set yourself to a time zone.
**-ft map** - View a map of available time zones.
**-ft time *<user>*** - Get the current time of a user.
**-ft time *<zone>*** -  Get the current time of a time zone.
**-ft format <12/24>** - Set your time format, `12` or `24` hours.
**-ft config** - Change server settings, for admins.
**-ft info** - More information about Friend Time.
configMessage: **Note**: You must have the `Administrator` permission to use the below commands.
**-ft config mode <react/list>** - Change the mode that is used for converting times.
**-ft config format <12/24>** - Change the servers time format, `12` or `24` hours.
**-ft config notify <on/off>** - Enable or disable reminders for users who don't have a time zone set.
infoMessage: See below for other useful information.
**-ft invite** - Invite Friend Time to your server.
**-ft support** - Get help or report an issue.
**-ft donate** - Donate to keep Friend Time running!
setProvideZone: Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
messages.setError: An error occurred while setting your time zone.
mapMessage: Please visit the following link and choose your time zone:
Then enter **-ft set <zone>** with your time zone.

**Note**: Use a time zone in the format **<region>/<city>**. For example: *America/New_York*. Time zone abbreviations like *EST* or *GMT* will not work. Shorthand can also be used and Friend Time will find the closest option: *-ft set new york*.
messages.clearError: An error occurred while clearing your time zone.
messages.formatError: An error occurred while setting your time format.
inviteMessage: Visit the following link to invite Friend Time to your Discord server:
supportMessage: Visit the following link to join the Friend Time support server:
If you prefer, you can also submit a GitHub issue:
donateMessage: Donate to help the continued development and running of Friend Time!

I originally created Friend Time for my international friends to aid in planning our activities. I realized this would be useful to others as well, so I released Friend Time for anyone to use! If you enjoy using Friend Time and are willing to contribute, I sincerely appreciate your support!
Donations via PayPal or credit/debit card are accepted at the above link. Thank you again for your support!
zoneNotFound: Could not find a time zone with the provided name!
Type **-ft map** to view a map of available timezones.
noZoneSetReminder: Hi {AUTHOR}, it looks like you don't have a timezone set yet.
Please type **-ft map** to find your time zone, then **-ft set *<zone>*** to set yourself to that zone!
noZoneSetSelf: You don't have a time zone set yet!
Type **-ft map** to find your time zone, then **-ft set *<zone>*** to set yourself to that zone!
messages.noZoneSetUser: **{USER}** doesn't have a time zone set yet!
invalidTimeFormat: Please provide a valid time format!
Available options: `12` for 12-hour format or `24` for 24-hour format.
messages.retrieveServerDataError: An error occurred while retrieving the servers data.
messages.retrieveUserDataError: An error occurred while retrieving user data.
messages.retrieveServerMembersError: An error occurred while retrieving server members.
messages.retrieveDistinctTimeZonesError: An error occurred while retrieving distinct time zones.
convertedTime: In your time zone, **{USER_ZONE}**, that is **{CONVERTED_TIME}**.
messages.serverOnly: This command only works in a server!
messages.configNotFound: Could not find a configuration option with the provided name!
configModeInvalidValue: Please provide a valid mode option!
Available options: `react` for react mode or `list` for list mode.
configFormatInvalidValue: Please provide a valid format option!
Available options: `12` for 12-hour format or `24` for 24-hour format.
configNotifyInvalidValue: Please provide a valid notify option!
Available options: `on` to enable notifications or `off` to disable.
messages.notAdmin: You must have the `Administrator` permission to use this command!
